result.arabic_text: وَكَتَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَلۡوَاحِ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مَّوۡعِظَةٗ وَتَفۡصِيلٗا لِّكُلِّ شَيۡءٖ فَخُذۡهَا بِقُوَّةٖ وَأۡمُرۡ قَوۡمَكَ يَأۡخُذُواْ بِأَحۡسَنِهَاۚ سَأُوْرِيكُمۡ دَارَ ٱلۡفَٰسِقِينَ
result.translation: 145. Nabii Muusah tawraat lucwal madqooqik israa-iil xaylo kah ceyitti ittam kassis kee kulliimih baxxaqqa addal как tani nuktube, tokkel Muusaw tawraat kitab hirgitaay maqar luk Yallih taaqatal kaal ingicilliyaay ku mara diggi ittaah tayseemil kaak taamitaanamal ken amris, urna maray Yallih amrik yewqeh dabqi sin aybulleeyyo Akeeral kaak iyye Yalli.
